description:
This is an interactive work written in vanilla javascript + Sound.js micro-library by kittykatattack (https://github.com/kittykatattack/sound.js)

At the beginning wanted to create an artwork to celebrate the goal of having 100 followed on Twitter (a social media from the beginning of XXI century a.C. popular among tez NFT collectors/creators 😁).

The acheivement of getting to 100 followed was much easier than the one of programming what I had in mind (and when it's about writing code I'm quite lazy too), so it came much earlier. Then I had to make the acheivement requirements more difficult and I resolved in adding the constraint to have 180 followers too (I doubled the 100)

To be honest the artwork is not finished yet: there are inconstistent behaviours depending on browsers and other external factors, but as I'm writing those lines I may get 1 more follower and need to raise the achievement bar again.
